statements: UPDATE patient_feedback SET rating=4, feedback_text='Good service' WHERE feedback_id=1;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text='Improvement needed', rating=2 WHERE feedback_id=3;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great service' WHERE patient_id = 12345;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Improvements needed', rating = 2 WHERE patient_id = 54321;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Thank you for the great service!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_score = 90, survey_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE survey_id = 4;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service!', feedback_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE patient_id = 123 AND feedback_id = 456;

UPDATE surveys SET survey_score = 95, survey_questions = 'Q1: How satisfied are you with the services? Q2: Any suggestions for improvement?', survey_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE survey_id = 789 AND patient_id = 456;
UPDATE PatientFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Good experience' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE MentalHealthPrograms SET program_description = 'Program promoting mental well-being' WHERE program_id = 3;
UPDATE PatientFeedback SET feedback_text='Great service!', feedback_date='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE feedback_id=1;
UPDATE PatientSurvey SET survey_score=8, survey_date='2022-09-20 14:45:00' WHERE survey_id=2;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Updated feedback text' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE program_feedback SET effectiveness_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great program!' WHERE feedback_id = 2;
UPDATE patient_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Improved services, thank you!', helpfulness_rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE Feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service! Highly recommended.', feedback_date = '2022-06-15 09:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = 201;
